projects.title: Master's Project: CityScale Geolocalization
projects.description: It's essentially a 'Geuguessr Bot' ... Using a psuedo ensemble of machine learning methods to improve significantly on a src distirbution about a 20km^2 area.

projects.title: Machine Learning to Defeat Dark Souls Bosses
projects.description: Specifically, the Asylum Demon Tutorial Fight. Unlike other bosses, this one is pretty trivially bested with few inputs. CheatEngine used to hook the game, CV and ML used to extract features, determine locations etc. Custom interface available too. Transfer learning and synthetic data generation,

projects.title: Free Chess ELO Estimation Tool
projects.description: Trained w/ 33m games, free alternative to the elo estimation tool on chess.com. Usually you'd need to check in with stockfish at each step to make this determination, but there's so much data through the lichess database that we get pretty close. Hosted on github pages
